name: Osso
description: Open Source Single Sign-On - authenticate SAML users from SSO IDPs into your application

BASE_URL.description: The host where your application is deployed - be sure to update to match a custom domain

SESSION_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

JWT_HMAC_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed JWTs from your application.

JWT_URL.description: The authorization URL in your application where Osso can send a user to get a JWT
